attributes.action: Enfranchise all Scots who do not live in Scotland to vote in Scottish parliamentary elections and any referenda on its future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Scots or British with Scottish upbringing and family have no say in the current debate on Independence. We have interests north of the border but have no means by which to influence its outcome. UK residents abroad have the right to vote in UK elections by post and under the new constitutional arrangements this right should be extended. I would expect that the vast majority of Scots living in England or elesewhere would not support Scottish Independence and believe that prosperity and peace on our island is best served by the strengthening of the United Kingdom.
